com.zonarsystems.twenty20.sdk.driver

Class DriverProfile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.zonarsystems.twenty20.sdk.driver.DriverProfile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DriverProfile
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Driver Profile type is used to represent the driver of a vehicle w/ a 2020 in it. This data is returned when a driver authenticates with the Zonar backend. This object data COULD be serialized, but is not. It is manually created via the setters.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_DRIVER_LOGIN
        The constant ACTION_DRIVER_LOGIN. used for subscribing to broadcasts when the driver logs in
        See Also:

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_SWITCH_ACTIVE_DRIVER

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_SWITCH_ACTIVE_DRIVER
        The constant ACTION_SWITCH_ACTIVE_DRIVER. used for subscribing to broadcasts when the co-driver switches to become the primary driver.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • ACTION_DRIVER_PROFILE_DATA_CHANGED

        public static final java.lang.String ACTION_DRIVER_PROFILE_DATA_CHANGED
        The constant ACTION_DRIVER_PROFILE_DATA_CHANGED. used for subscribing to broadcasts when the driver profile data has changed. Typically this will happen when a driver authenticates from cache, but an asynchronous callback from the zonar backend indicates that the data has changed.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_DRIVER_PROFILE

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_DRIVER_PROFILE
        The constant EXTRA_DRIVER_PROFILE. Extra used when retrieving the driver profile from a bundle.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_WAS_DRIVER

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_WAS_DRIVER
        The constant EXTRA_WAS_DRIVER. Extra used when retrieving info about a logged out driver from a bundle. If driver was logging out, then value in bundle is true, if co-driver false.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • EXTRA_DRIVER_PROFILE_OLD

        public static final java.lang.String EXTRA_DRIVER_PROFILE_OLD
        The constant EXTRA_DRIVER_PROFILE_OLD. Extra used when retrieving the old driver profile when the driver profile changes from a bundle.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getRuleset

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String getRuleset()
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the driver's ruleset as a string value. Ruleset is now an app setting for ZLogs, so this method will probably just return UNKNOWN. Use ZLogs's ConfigurationHelper to access ruleset info. Ruleset info currently inaccessible outside of ZLogs.
        Returns:
        the ruleset

      • setRuleset

        public void setRuleset(java.lang.String ruleset)
        Sets ruleset stored in the DriverProfile. This does not affect the ruleset used by ZLogs/Rules Engine to evaluate duty status logs. That information is accessible only in ZLogs, through the ConfigurationHelper.
        Parameters:
        ruleset - the ruleset
